title: Spire
description: Spire Health Tag is re-inventing 'wearables' - by making the device  disappear. No charging. No remembering to wear. No changing what you do. Just get up, put on the clothes you already wear and go. With a battery that lasts 1.5 years and comprehensive sensors (HR/HRV, breathing, sleep, activity), Spire Health Tag makes your clothes smart.
